title: Archives of Toxicology
additional-notes: This is a German publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. Some catalog records list New York as an additional publisher location for this journal, but we are not sure when or if simultaneous American publication began.
This journal was published under the title 'Sammlung von Vergiftungsfällen' from 1930 to 1954.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Ed Deegan for copyright research on this title.
